lead_paragraph: With the craft beer industry growing rapidly over the last decade, more universities are offering online programs about the business side of craft beer.

headline.print_headline: Universities Offer Classes for Those Interested in Beer
headline.main: Universities Offers Classes for Those Interested in Beer

snippet: With the craft beer industry growing rapidly over the last decade, more universities are offering online programs about the business side of craft beer.
abstract: Growing number of universities are offering online programs exploring business involved in making craft beer; craft breweries have burgeoned to 4,000 from 1,400 in 2005.
